packaged_products.name: i8
packaged_products.description: You have to feel the luxurious, soothing comfort and pressure relief
packaged_products.long_description: A wonderful 6" combination of pressure-relieving comfort layers with a temperature balancing sleep surface for comforting, soothing sleep.
packaged_products.meta_description: The i8 360 Smart Bed has maximum pressure relief and soothing comfort to ensure that you sleep comfortably all night long. Discover the difference of a Sleep Number Mattress today.
packaged_products.positioning_statement: You have to feel the luxurious, soothing comfort and pressure relief
packaged_products.disclaimer: Furniture sold separately. Prices higher in AK and HI
packaged_products.upsell_text: Standard base sold separately. Options available in shopping cart.

features.name: Dual Adjustability
features.text: Adjusts to your comfort on both sides - your Sleep Number<sup>®</sup> setting.

features.name: Responsive Air<sup>®</sup> technology
features.text: Effortlessly responds and automatically adjusts firmness on each side

features.name: SleepIQ<sup>®</sup> technology
features.text: Tracks how you’re sleeping, so you know how your day affects your night.

features.name: Temperature balancing sleep surface
features.text: Absorbs excess heat and releases it as you cool, so you sleep just right.

features.name: 12" Profile
features.text: Plush-style bed is measured from the base to the top of the mattress.

features.name: 6" Comfort layer
features.text: A wonderful 6" combination of pressure-relieving comfort layers with a temperature balancing sleep surface for comforting, soothing sleep.

features.name: Partner Snore
features.text: Gently raise your partner’s head to help alleviate snoring*

features.name: Lighting
features.text: Find your way at night with under bed lighting

features.name: Head Adjust
features.text: Endless head positions
